item.title: Smart Sources settings
item.description: Embedding Model Description: The Embedding Model determines how your notes are converted into vector representations for AI processing. Selecting a Model: Choose from available models (e.g., "TaylorAI/bge-micro-v2").

item.title: Manual Re-Embedding for Specific Notes
item.description: To re-embed a single note within Obsidian, use the “Refresh & make connections” command.

item.title: Inspect blocks created for a note
Settings in Smart Connect
item.description: The Settings section allows you to configure global preferences, security options, and other important aspects of the Smart Connect app. This includes managing your connection to the Smart Connect Official Service, adjusting security settings, monitoring performance and token usage, and utilizing debugging tools to maintain optimal functionality.

item.title: Smart Actions in Smart Connect
item.description: Smart Actions allow you to define how the AI interacts with your notes by specifying the operations it can perform. They are crucial for managing workflows and customizing AI behavior to suit your specific needs.

item.title: Smart Environments in Smart Connect
item.description: Smart Environments are a core component of the Smart Connect app, designed to provide seamless integration between your local notes and AI-powered processing ...
